name: The Eco of Tammy's Ghost
description:
The Eco of Tammy's Ghost

A short horror Visual Novel about a girl that goes missing and months later is found by the local gardener Jack.

Whether the girl was kidnapped or just got lost in the woods is unknown.

Liked the game?

Then please consider supporting it - it's free to do so! Learn how to support me as a creator here!

Also, please DM me on Twitter @InteractiveSto3 if you find any bugs! I would really appreciate that!

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

Art:

  • Character Sprites Miki
  • Background art by Uncle Mugen
SPOILER ALERT: This game has jumpscares
